Subject: Contact with Panzertron
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 106
From: Yanshosh@...

::Zardus::

Zardus nods, watching as the oblitercons depart. He turns around to exit the 
room, recieving Panzertron's transmission. Alone? In a strange ship? Zardus' 
eyes narrow.

"I'll be there shortly. I would prefer to meet outside your ship. As far as 
confortable," he replies, walking off toward the bridge.

He presses his finger on his comm-link. "Nemesis, Delta," he says into it. 
"Please meet me at the bridge. We have someone to pay a visit to."
